summary:
The Twilight series is about a teen girl, Bella, who moves to Washington and falls in love with a 104-year-old vampire, Edward. Written by Stephenie Meyer, it includes four main books and some extras. The story is mostly from Bella's view, but some parts are from a werewolf named Jacob.

These books are super popular, winning awards and selling over 160 million copies worldwide. They were turned into movies and even inspired an animated TV series. The series has made a big impact on young adult literature and pop culture.
title: Twilight (novel series)
